examples: We need to have a talk about our relationship.
She gave a talk on the importance of education.
Precisamos ter uma conversa sobre nosso relacionamento.
Ela deu uma palestra sobre a importância da educação.

suggested: Why did the tomato turn red? Because it saw the salad dressing!
Breaking up with someone you love can be a heart-wrenching experience, even if it's just a talk.
Why did the argument escalate? Because the two parties involved refused to listen and talk calmly.
Receiving unexpected good news during a talk can be a surprising and uplifting experience.
The smell of fresh coffee during a morning talk with a loved one.
The touch of a comforting hand during a difficult talk with a friend.
The emotional connection and understanding gained through meaningful and open conversations.
